name: wizard
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a man who is believed to have magical powers and who uses them to harm or help other people
informal (UK also whizz); (US also whiz, wiz) someone who is an expert at something or who has great ability in a particular subject: a computer wizard Your mother's a wizard at Scrabble.
